LanguageData.JRWBaseopsisReconstruct.label: Baseopsis
LanguageData.JRWBaseopsisReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #04831-1889 [BASEOPSIS SIBIRICA] CODENAME: ORIGAMI >4910
A humongous species of earwig with a pair of terrifying looking pincers. While generally docile and would prefer to flee at smaller sizes, the enlarge proportions of this invertebrate makes them more hardy and a dangerous foe to deal with. Their wings fold like paper, and shine in the light.
